title: Advanced Anatomy Learning Course Based on Ultrasound Imaging

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational anatomy knowledge and experience interpreting medical imaging
context.additional_context: Intensive training program utilizing mobile devices in environments with limited access to practical equipment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify major anatomical structures of the thorax and abdomen in ultrasound images with 90% accuracy.
Learners can explain the correlation between anatomical knowledge and ultrasound imaging to apply it to clinical cases.
Learners can complete self-directed practical content via a mobile learning platform at least three times per week.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
